channel.title: KillaScpaePkz V1.0 Coder Needed not much coding simple tasks)
channel.description:
This is not an original server i am using JezuzScape Pkz...
I really need help with my coding becuase i am a complete idoit at this, because im new to it.. I just need help i dont want the coder to just do it for me... This is my first ever server and i dont even know how to add an object i would just really like an idiots guide on basically these:
Adding Shops
Adding Npcs
Adding Objects
Deleting Shops
Deleting Npcs
Deleting Objects
If you help me with these i will make u a mod on my server and i garuntee this server will be up for longer than a year..
I hope to make this one of THE BEST Servers and i hope to become a very good coder with the help of the best! Thanks For your help in advance... :)
